data.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence is not an act, but a habit.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow men. True nobility lies in being superior to your former self.
data.author: Ernest Hemingway

data.quote: A man that flies from his fear may find that he has only taken a short cut to meet it.
data.author: JRR Tolkien

data.quote: So comes snow after fire, and even dragons have their endings
data.author: JRR Tolkien

data.quote: All that is gold does not glitter
data.author: JRR Tolkien

data.quote: Not all those who wander are lost
data.author: JRR Tolkien

data.quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
data.author: JRR Tolkien

data.quote: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: Begin - to begin is half the work, let half still remain; again begin this, and thou wilt have finished.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: If you fulfill your obligations everyday you don't need to worry about the future.
data.author: Jordan Peterson

data.quote: Perhaps you are overvaluing what you donâ€™t have and undervaluing what you do.
data.author: Jordan Peterson

data.quote: Compare yourself to who you were yesterday, not to who someone else is today.
data.author: Jordan Peterson

data.quote: It's a dangerous business, Frodo, going out your door. You step onto the road, and if you don't keep your feet, there's no knowing where you might be swept off to.
data.author: JRR Tolkien

data.quote: The soul becomes dyed with the color of its thoughts.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: And now that you don't have to be perfect, you can be good.
data.author: John Steinbeck

data.quote: You can't "try" to do things. You simply "must" do things.
data.author: Ray Bradbury

data.quote: For as he thinks in his heart, so he is.
data.author: Proverbs 23:7

data.quote: Discipline Equals Freedom
data.author: Jocko Willink

data.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step
data.author: Lao Tzu
